channel.title: Need help plz
channel.description:
Hi, can someone tell me how to modify the xp that the dummy give when i hit like it can give 2000xp at a time....
Thanks
------------------------------Revol 2-------------------------------------------

item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @revol_2 revol 2
item.description:

addSkillXP((250), 0);
} else if(FightType == 2) {
addSkillXP((250), 2);
} else if(FightType == 3) {
addSkillXP((50), 0);
addSkillXP((50), 1);
addSkillXP((50), 2);
} else if(FightType == 4) {
addSkillXP((250), 1);
}
addSkillXP((50), 3);
addSkillXP((25), 18);
sendMessage(“You attack the dummy.”);
actionTimer = 20;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2007, 04:27:40 PM[/size][hr]it is the adskillXp(this)…?

item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

When u hit the dummy search for what it says in client.java and then u will see some numbers, change them to 2000 or how ever u want.

Btw it will look like this after

addSkillXP(2000*playerLevel[0], 0); //Adds 30 XP to Attack
addSkillXP(2000*playerLevel[3], 3); //Adds 8 XP to Hit Points

Ta

Read full topic
